Dating: PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD; ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; RELIEF; ENGRAVED
Name: Lamp
Description: Lamp, circular in form. The centre of the body shows a decoration on the basis of parallel incisions. It shows no potter's marks. The opening for the light is blackened as a consequence of use.
